power.title: Bash and Pinion
power.fluff: You slam your weapon through your foe's defenses, creating an opening and stepping in to trap your enemy
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] damage, and you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.
Effect: You grab the target until the end of your next turn.
Until the grab ends, the target takes a penalty to all attack rolls equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Bell Ringer
power.fluff: You smash your weapon into your enemy, jarring its vitals
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + number of healing surges you have expended damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Hammer or Mace: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
true You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Miss: Half damage, and the target cannot take triggered actions until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Covering Attack
power.fluff: You launch a ferocious attack at your enemy, allowing one of your allies to safely retreat from it
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can shift up to 2 squares as a free reaction
Miss: An ally adjacent to the target can shift up to 1 square as a free reaction.
true Effect: Until the end of your next turn, if the target makes an attack against the ally you allowed to shift, your enforce challenge gains the following benefits:
true 1 You can trigger enforce challenge even if the target's attack includes you.
true 1 If the target's attack does not include you, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll and deal half damage on a miss.

power.title: Distracting Spate
power.fluff: Your flurry of feints and strikes leaves your foe's defenses unstead
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Two Melee Weapons: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Effect: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
If your attack hit, you can choose for the target to instead grant combat advantage to an ally of your choice.

power.title: Funneling Flurry

Secondary Attack: Melee weapon one creature other than the primary target Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)
true Hit: 1[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 1 square.

power.title: Goading Maneuver
power.fluff: After a swift strike, you step to the side and goad more foes to focus on you
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you shift up to 2 squares.
true 1 Flail or Pick: You can slide the target up to 2 squares to a space adjacent to you after you have shifted.
Miss: You shift up to half the distance.
true Effect: You can mark any enemies adjacent to you. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.

true Effect: The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage.
